desc: Hand poured candles in small batches with a soy blend wax and premium oils that will fill your room with warmth and aroma. Scented wax melts, odor eliminator room sprays, jar candle made with a soy blend wax and wicks made with natural fiber. Made in the USA with US products.

layout.text: Each candle is hand poured in small batches with a soy blend wax and premium oils that will fill your room with warmth and aroma.
